aside.p: Finally have HIT be automatically created given its name, description, your AWS access and secret key credentials, and the number of workers. Deprecate currency (AWS uses only USD). Allow for both sandbox and production mode. Add a quickstart guide and the version history. Finally, make the lottery amount be a dynamic field when starting the experiment. If unspecified, a lottery is not computed—much simpler than needing to specify the lottery status and manually editing the instructions file!
